title: Pixel 4a won't charge, it is at 0%.
content:
I had 5% of battery on my phone. So, I've put it on charge, then I noticed it won't, tried the charger on other type C devices. The charger works on them. Now it is 0%. I've factory reset the phone and nothing works.
Note:
I've contacted @madebygoogle on twitter + did the troubleshoots, still Nothing. Help!
